messages.message: Question: Will AI Hub API access allow interaction with Converse? The scenario I'm thinking of is if a user is interacting with a document in some type of business application, content repository, etc., and they want to chat with the document, will our AI Hub API allow them to send the document and a prompt and get a response? Or, is it limited to calling "Apps" built in AI Hub?

@ChrisM we will support APIs for both Converse (starting in 23.08) and running apps (starting 23.07). I’d to hear more details about the workflows that you’re hearing from the partners for Converse APIs.
I'll keep you posted as conversations progress.
